name: find-rep-api
description: Super simple wrapper around the api at whosimyrepresentative.com/api

scripts.start: concurrently "NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 nodemon" " cd react-spa && PORT=3001 yarn start"
scripts.build: yarn && cd react-spa && yarn && yarn build && cd .. && cp -R react-spa/build/ public/ && mv public/index.html public/app.html
